body_html:
Commented on the PR.

On Sat, Oct 22, 2016 at 3:37 PM, Ankush Gupta notifications@github.com
wrote:

Ran into this. The following fix works:

flat_input = tuple(array_ops.transpose(input_, [1, 0] + [i for i in xrange(2,input_.get_shape().ndims)])
for input_ in flat_input)

and, similarly for Line 843

tensorflow/tensorflow/python/ops/rnn.py

Line 843 in 33b336a

flat_output = [array_ops.transpose(output, [1, 0, 2])

:

  flat_output = [array_ops.transpose(output, [1, 0] + [i for i in xrange(2,output.get_shape().ndims)])
                 for output in flat_output]

—
You are receiving this because you were assigned.
Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub
#3882 (comment),
or mute the thread
https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/ABtimzZphsalCxMfeT4iiOOZ197Edwmbks5q2pAygaJpZM4Jm1JV
.

for input_ in flat_input)
and, similarly for Line 843

:

                 for output in flat_output]

body:
Commented on the PR.

On Sat, Oct 22, 2016 at 3:37 PM, Ankush Gupta notifications@github.com
wrote:

> Ran into this. The following fix works:
> 
>  flat_input = tuple(array_ops.transpose(input_, [1, 0] + [i for i in xrange(2,input_.get_shape().ndims)])
>                        for input_ in flat_input)
> 
> and, similarly for Line 843
> https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/33b336ada58529d5e0398feea423785f1c3d57c1/tensorflow/python/ops/rnn.py#L843
> :
> 
> ```
>   flat_output = [array_ops.transpose(output, [1, 0] + [i for i in xrange(2,output.get_shape().ndims)])
>                  for output in flat_output]
> ```
> 
> —
